mutants.original_line: remaining_elements = len(arr) % n  # Calculate the remaining elements
mutants.code:
def split_array(arr, n, m):
    slices = []
    slice_length = min(m, len(arr) // n)
    remaining_elements = len(arr) * n
    start = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if i < remaining_elements:
            slice = arr[start:start + slice_length + 1]
            start += slice_length + 1
        else:
            slice = arr[start:start + slice_length]
            start += slice_length
        slices.append(slice)
    return slices
